Flower | blank2_info_sec1 = Lilium longiflorum | blank3_name_sec1 = -Flowering Tree | blank3_info_sec1 = Chinese hibiscus | blank4_name_sec1 = -Insect | blank4_info_sec1 = Great Orange Tip | blank5_name_sec1 = | blank5_info_sec1 = | blank6_name_sec1 = | blank6_info_sec1 = | blank7_name_sec1 = | blank7_info_sec1 = | blank_name_sec2 = Phone number | blank_info_sec2 = 0997-22-1111 | blank1_name_sec2 = Address | blank1_info_sec2 = 7612 Nishinoomote, Nishinoomote-shi, Kagoshima-ken 891-3193 | website = | footnotes = }} is a Japanese city in Kagoshima Prefecture on the island of Tanegashima. ==History== The city was established on 1 October 1958. ===Timeline=== * 1543 (Tenbun 12, 25th day of the 8th month): Portuguese ship landed at Tanegashima bringing the first gun into Japan. History of Kagoshima ; retrieved 2011-12-6. Fernão Mendes Pinto is believed to be the first European to set foot on Japan. * 1993 (Heisei 5): Nishinoomote developed a twin town link with Vila do Bispo, Portugal.Embassy of Portugal in Tokyo, Twin Cities ; retrieved 2012-4-8. ==Related pages== * Nishinoomote Seamount ==References== ==Other websites== * http://www.city.nishinoomote.kagoshima.jp/ Category:Cities in Kagoshima Prefecture
title: Nishinoomote, Kagoshima
